Title: SCHOTT Inspires Next Generation During Manufacturing Day 2025
Summary: SCHOTT celebrates Manufacturing Day with school visits across four states, connecting students with modern manufacturing careers Company launches third annual SCHOTT Innovation Challenge with $1,000 prize Initiative aligns with the resurgence of American manufacturing sector, a backbone of the economy, which grew 5% in employment to 12.6 million jobs and 19% locations to 401,000 over the last decade
